candidate.name: Sarah Chen
strengths: Expert in React, Node.js, and TypeScript with 8+ years of production experience
Led migration of monolithic architecture to microservices, reducing latency by 40%
Strong system design skills with proven track record in scaling applications to millions of users
Excellent communication and mentorship abilities - mentored 5 junior developers
Experience in fintech domain with understanding of regulatory compliance
weaknesses: Limited experience with cloud infrastructure (AWS/GCP) - mostly worked with managed services
Gap in DevOps practices and CI/CD pipeline optimization
Needs improvement in automated testing coverage - current projects have 60% coverage
Less familiar with modern data engineering tools and practices

budgetedRange.notes: For Singapore-based senior engineers with 6-10 years experience

marketContext.demandTrend: High demand for senior engineers in Singapore fintech market
competitiveFactors: Multiple fintech companies expanding in Singapore
Limited pool of experienced senior engineers with fintech background
Average time-to-fill for this role: 45-60 days
retentionConsiderations: Counter-offers are common for candidates from established tech companies
Equity value appreciation is key differentiator for startup/growth-stage companies
Work-life balance and remote flexibility increasingly important post-2024
